text: 3 Doors Down is an American alternative rock band. They formed in 1994 in Escatawpa, Mississippi. The members of the group are Brad Arnold, the singer, Matt Roberts, who plays the lead guitar and backing vocals, Chris Henderson, who plays the rhythm guitar, Todd Harrell who plays the bass guitar and Greg Upchurch, who plays the drums. ==Discography== ===Studio albums=== *2000: The Better Life *2002: Away from the Sun *2005: Seventeen Days *2008: 3 Doors Down *2011: Time of My Life *2016: Us and the Night ==References== ==Other websites== * 3 Doors Down's official website Category:American rock bands Category:Musical groups from Mississippi Category:Post-grunge bands
